QuestData.Title: Grant Me Revenge
QuestData.Description:
I don't care who you pledge allegiance to, $r. I need Hogger dead!
He--and the other cretins in this Light-forsaken place--have slain my men. The Alliance and the Horde may not see eyes-to-eye, but you must know that murdering my people in cold blood cannot stand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Randolph Moloch, Lord Overheat, and Hogger.
QuestData.RewardText:
The uprising quelled, the elements calmed, and Hogger slain... I cannot thank you enough, $n. My people have been avenged.
Thank you.
